Pre-Game Insights: Argentina has a 100% record in all competitions in 2024 and a 1-0 away win over Brazil in their previous World Cup qualifying match.
Chile have won just two of their last nine games in all competitions, both in friendlies, and suffered a 1-0 away loss to Ecuador in their last World Cup qualifying match.
The Copa America 2024 winners are unbeaten in their last seven meetings against La Roja, recording four wins.
Argentina have an unbeaten home record against La Roja in all competitions.
Lionel Messi misses out due to an injury, while Nicolás Tagliafico and Leonardo Balerdi are also absent. Ángel Di María retired after the Copa America and will be honored before the match.
Claudio Bravo announced his retirement from international football last week and is not in the squad. Alexis Sánchez and Diego Valdez are also injured.
